01.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/page/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?content WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression ; crm:P102_has_title ?title . ?title crm:P2_has_type aat:300417207 ; crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?content . FILTER( lang(?content) = "$LANG$") }

02.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P2_has_type ?type . ?type rdfs:label ?label . FILTER( lang(?label) = "$LANG$")}

03.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P32_used_general_technique ?technique . ?technique rdfs:label ?label . FILTER( lang(?label) = "$LANG$")}

04.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT REPLACE(STR(?label), "_", " "); SEPARATOR="; ") AS ?subjects) WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation ; crm:P129_is_about ?subject . ?subject crm:P1_is_identified_by ?sub_app . ?sub_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?label .  } GROUP BY ?item

05.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item (IF(STR(YEAR(?begin)) = STR(YEAR(?end)), STR(YEAR(?begin)), CONCAT(STR(YEAR(?begin)), '-', STR(YEAR(?end)))) AS ?date) WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P4_has_time-span ?timespan . ?timespan crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?begin ; crm:P82b_end_of_the_end ?end . }

06.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300404387 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name)}

07.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300404386 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name)}

08.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300053225 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name)}

09.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300054686 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name)}

10.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300417639 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name)}

11.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/page/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item .  ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression . ?activity crm:P16_used_specific_object ?item ; a crm:E7_Activity ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?uri . ?uri crm:P1_is_identified_by ?appellation . ?appellation crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?label.}

12.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/page/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item (REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?conservation_place), ".*/([^/]+)/[^/]+$", "$1"), "_", " ") AS ?conservation_place_label) WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?activity crm:P16_used_specific_object ?item ; crm:P2_has_type aat:300054277 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?conservation_org . ?conservation_org crm:P74_has_current_or_former_residence ?conservation_place . }

13.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?digital_repr WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P130i_features_are_also_found_on ?digital_repr . }

14.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?existing_model WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>}   ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item ; crm:P130i_features_are_also_found_on ?3d_model . ?3d_model crm:P130_shows_features_of ?existing_model .}

15.query: PREFIX crmdig: <http://www.ics.forth.gr/isl/CRMdig/> PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?licence_label WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?digitisation crmdig:L1_digitized ?item ; crmdig:L11_had_output ?model . ?licence crm:P67_refers_to ?model ; crm:P1_is_identified_by ?licence_app . ?licence_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?licence_label .}

16.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?begin ?end WHERE {?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P4_has_time-span ?timespan . ?timespan crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?begin ; crm:P82b_end_of_the_end ?end . }
